summary: This is an internal Bureau of Prisons email providing a Monday morning update on suicide watch and psychological observation status for inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It specifically mentions Jeffrey Epstein's status and pending bedspace assignment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 with pending bedspace for SHU (Special Housing Unit) at Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Lopez
persons.context: Listed as inmate #20472-038, mentioned in the same status update as Epstein.

events.title: Monday AM Suicide Watch Update
events.description: Internal Bureau of Prisons email provides status update on suicide watch and psychological observation for inmates including Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was inmate #76318-054 at Metropolitan Correctional Center as of July 29, 2019.
The document shows Epstein had 'pending bedspace for SHU' (Special Housing Unit) at the time of this update.
The email indicates Epstein was not on suicide watch but was under psychological observation.
This document was created just weeks before Epstein's death in August 2019 while in custody.
The correspondence shows routine monitoring procedures for high-profile inmates in federal custody.
